Data:
==Applies To==

* Android applications that use location services.
* Android applications that log data.

==What to Do==

Do not log location data.

==Why==

Logging location data is likely to raise privacy concerns among users.

==How==

If your application uses location data, do not store it in files and do not send it to remote servers.

==Privacy Guidelines==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000561ff3|Do Not Cache Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007e1362|Do Not Log Location Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000001dcb79|Do Not Log Sensitive Data]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000629cc3|Delete Cached Data after Use]]

==Privacy Checklists==

* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000003b2aca|Sensitive Data Is Not Cached]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000006c27b2|Location Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000005a7753|Sensitive Data Is Not Logged]]
* [[00000000-0000-0000-0000-0000007c99a7|Cached Data Is Deleted after Use]]

==Additional Resources==

* For more information about logging on Android, please see http://developer.android.com/tools/debugging/debugging-log.html
* For more information about the //Log// class, please see http://developer.android.com/reference/android/util/Log.html
* For a tutorial on Android logging, please see http://mobile.tutsplus.com/tutorials/android/logcat_android-sdk/
